divs: sighting detailsi was moving a mattress into my house with the help of my father, and i happened to be looking up at the sky when i was doing it and saw a bright star light object moving slowly from north west to the south east. i had a recent experience with a similar object less than three months before, so i watched it, but did not bring it up to my father, who is skeptical of the phenomena. it was moving slowly, and had a steady yellowish glow to it. there were no strobes or navigation lights that i could see, although i could see several other strobes of aircraft in the same area (a few miles in the distance). the sky was perfectly clear and i could see lots of stars(my house is in a small town). after about 3-5 minutes, the object vanished. prior to it vanishing it was in my clear sight, about 40 degrees above horizon. it appeared to be the same type of light i had seen before in my previous report (08\05\2008 - benson, nc), and in the same area as the object i saw before (about 7-10 miles from where my house is).
